test.doc: Verifies the main content of the homepage which includes, verifying the image, the URLs and also clicking on the different navigation buttons and verifying the navigation between the different comics.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://p' contains exact text 'To receive the comic and news postings in your inbox, subscribe here.'.

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Replace String
kw.doc: Replaces ``search_for`` in the given ``string`` with ``replace_with``.
kw.msg: ${expectedMessage} = You should receive an email at <7001soukaina-xkcd@sharklasers.com> shortly which will enable you to complete the signup process.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://body' contains exact text 'You should receive an email at <7001soukaina-xkcd@sharklasers.com> shortly which will enable you to complete the signup process.'.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
